pull_tooltip: Pull this item from {0} to here({1})
close_file_title: Do you really want to finish editing and close file?
close_file_description: Changes made after last save will not be applied
file_load_src_description: May be using another explorer to pasting path is more convenient
file_load_failed_description: Selected file may have invalid format, or developer's fault. Please file an issue!
file_save_description:
Selecting directory will save file in that location which have same name with input file,
selecting file will save exactly in that file
inventory_full_title: Inventory is too heavy to add new Item! Try move items to storage!
inventory_delete_title: {0}Do you really want to delete this item?
inventory_delete_description: You can get emeralds if you salvage this in game, but deleting here can't.
inventory_duplicate_title: This item is in {0}. Where do you want to dupliate this item?
pak_indexing_description: This may take a bit, please wait until finishes!
pak_not_found_description:
Editor could not find game resources in predictable locations.
Please set game resources(.pak) directory manually.
tap_to_close: Press Esc or any empty space to close
tap_to_cancel: Press Esc or any empty space to cancel
item_creation_other_options_description: You can edit other properties after adding this item!
item_creation_armor_property_description: Default set of armor properties are manually hard coded, so it may not accurate.
enchantment_unset:
Set this slot as inactivated.
Applying this to netherite enchantment will delete this item's glided property.
tips_0: You can display maximum 2 items in this area using LeftClick or RightClick
tips_1: To modify inactive enchantments in activated slot, set activated enchantment's level to zero first.
tips_2: To remove enchantment or armor property, click selected item in left list again.
tips_3: To exit popup without any 'close' or 'cancel' button, click any position in window.
tips_4: File selector, using another explorer to pasting path is more convenient
tips_5: There is no guarantee with edit output file is playable in game, so MAKE BACKUPS PROPERLY.
enchantment_empty_slot:
Enchantment does not set.
Select preferred enchantment in left area!
armor_property_empty: Select preferred armor property in left area!
exit_application_title: Do you really want to exit application?
exit_application_description: All changes made after last save will not be saved.
error_detail_label: Please capture this screen and open an issue in github.
tip_desc:
You can left click or right click
to preview items in this area.
tower_delete_all_title: Do you REALLY want to delete ALL tower data?
tower_no_data_desc_0: We cannot create new tower because it has Unique Id which validates in server
tower_no_data_desc_1: Instead, start tower in game and use 'exit tower' button in game menu. Then you can edit them in this screen.
tower_no_data_desc_2: You can modify 'Lives Lost' field which indicates retry count of tower.
tower_use_edited_data_description_false: Preserve original data when saving data.
tower_experimental_warning_desc_2_true: Experimental feature. Some data may dropped or game may not recognize these data.
tower_experimental_warning_desc_2_false: Experimental feature. Game may not recognize these data.
tower_item_add: Select target item in left area
tower_edit_warning_title: You are about to edit Tower
tower_edit_desc_1: Your Microsoft Account may be SUSPENDED
tower_edit_desc_2: The developer has confirmed that the account was banned in the form of a “game ownership verification failed” during play after the tower modification.
tower_edit_desc_3: Modified towers will not work correctly.
tower_edit_desc_4: Some dummy internal tile and challenges exist, and some tile has it's own challenge that fits extra conditions.
tower_edit_desc_5: If you want to edit even those disadvantages:
tower_edit_desc_7: As long as you're modifying your tower, it's not unusual for your account to be suspended at any time. Not only your save data, your microsoft account will banned from Minecraft Dungeons.
tower_edit_desc_8: Do NOT complete modified tower(final floor)
tower_edit_desc_9: Tower rewards can be added safely enough by modifying existing items.
tower_edit_desc_10: Combat floor must have any challenge.
tower_edit_desc_11: If not, floor's exit will not spawned properly and will be stuck in that floor
tower_edit_desc_12: Merchant Floor's tile must be one of 'Staff Room' 1, 2, 3.
tower_edit_desc_13: So that merchants can spawn in proper location.
tower_edit_desc_14: The developer is not responsible for any data loss and any issues that occur with your account if you subsequently press "Continue Edit"
